content:
Where's the right place to ask about the futures(-preview) crate? -foundations seems incorrect.

In case anyone knows the answer for my specific question: Is there planned to be a stable release of futures-preview/futures coinciding with the stabilization of async/await (or ideally before...)?
stable as in a 0.3 release without the -alpha.*?
You can ask on foundations where there was already a discussion around it. In addition there is also an open GitHub issue around this: https://github.com/rust-lang-nursery/futures-rs/issues/1893
